column4: Hi arooni: I have not set a raid setup in place, but have done a great deal of reading on it. I think it would be wise to start the install under windows and get it working there first.
You will have to have a card of course and software and don't forget that bios
I think that you have your work cut out for you arooni.  You will have to read on the unbuntu boards to get a feel and to get your own thoughts stright before you start
